caption.p: Location of Dafeng Elk Nature Reserve in Jiangsu, China ( A), the classifications from the MODIS Land Cover Type Product (MCD12Q1) ( B), and the sampling design used in the present study ( C). T1, T3, and T5 represent three tidal levels, 1, 3, and 5 km from the coastline, respectively. Samples were collected from 1 m Ã— 1 m plots at 30 points along each sample line.
